# Onboarding Friction Log Template

Track each pain point and cite the ISO 9241-110 clause it violates.

| ID | Screen / Step | Observed friction | ISO 9241-110 clause | Evidence (timestamp / quote) | Severity (H/M/L) |
|----|---------------|-------------------|----------------------|------------------------------|------------------|
| 1  |               |                   |                      |                              |                  |
| 2  |               |                   |                      |                              |                  |
| 3  |               |                   |                      |                              |                  |
| 4  |               |                   |                      |                              |                  |
| 5  |               |                   |                      |                              |                  |

Tips:
- Reference the transcripts file for timestamps.
- Keep language user-focused (describe what the person experienced, not just the UI state).
- Severity should reflect business or human risk, not developer effort.
